price: そこで信仰者たちは試練を受け、激しく動揺した。
arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱبۡتُلِيَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَزُلۡزِلُواْ زِلۡزَالٗا شَدِيدٗا

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: hunālika ub'tuliya al-mu'minūna wazul'zilū zil'zālan shadīdan
